duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop end-to-end business intelligence solutions using Azure technologies.
Collaborate with business analysts and development teams.
Create and maintain SQL queries, stored procedures, and functions to extract, transform, and load data.
Design and develop interactive dashboards using Microsoft Power BI.
Optimize and tune SQL queries, data models, and ETL processes for performance and efficiency.
Implement data security measures and ensure compliance with data governance policies.
Keep up-to-date with the latest Microsoft BI technologies and best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, or Information Systems (Master's preferred)
